caption:
This photograph features a close-up portrait of an elderly man, positioned slightly to the right in the frame and looking towards the left. The man is wearing a white and mesh-back cap and a white crewneck t-shirt. He appears weathered, with deep lines and wrinkles on his face which suggest a life of outdoor work or exposure. His expression is pensive and contemplative, adding a strong emotive component to the image.

The lighting is warm and seems to be natural, possibly indicating late afternoon or near sunset. This lighting casts shadows on his face, highlighting his rugged features and the texture of his skin.

The background is out of focus, softly blurred with hints of dark and light areas that could possibly be water or a distant landscape. The soft focus ensures that the attention remains primarily on the man.

Overall, the composition and warm tones of the picture provide a sense of calm and depth, focusing on the quiet dignity and reflective mood of the subject.
title: Warren freeman, 50, built a cottage on an island in the Kansas river.  The island lies between the 18th street and east Kansas avenue bridges.  Unemployment checks and fishing are his present means of support
